snippet: Having played just one tournament since mid-September due to various injuries and a recent bout of flu, Serena Williams is now itching to get back into competition with the Rio Olympics among her top priorities for the year....
lead_paragraph: Having played just one tournament since mid-September due to various injuries and a recent bout of flu, Serena Williams is now itching to get back into competition with the Rio Olympics among her top priorities for the year.

headline.print_headline: Rio a Prime Goal for Serena on Her Return to Competition
headline.main: Rio a Prime Goal for Serena on Her Return to Competition
